comment.brief: Standard alignment of the Y-Axis to the baseline
comment.full: Standard alignment of the Y-Axis to the baseline

comment.brief: Uses Y as current value and Z as the previous value to produce a ranged bar
comment.full: Uses Y as current value and Z as the previous value to produce a ranged bar

comment.brief: Covers the complete area for this axis step, ignoring the actual Y value. This is useful if you wish to add a background to the item, or enabled interaction on the whole region.
comment.full: Covers the complete area for this axis step, ignoring the actual Y value. This is useful if you wish to add a background to the item, or enabled interaction on the whole region.
